column1: Smoque BBQ////I went to Kansas City on business last year and the one thing I took away from this city is my deep affection for KC barbecue. I had it both days that I was there
column2: and I dreamt about it for months after. My gosh
column3: I crave that barbecue like a crazy person. The delicious smoked flavor of the meat has lingered with me and refuses to let go. So I've bitten my nails
column6: and have pretty much done anything to stop myself from jumping on a plane just to have dinner there.
